abstract: The deal is expected to strongly complement S&P Capital IQ’s offerings in banking and insurance and expand the analytics and capability of Platts.
snippet: The deal is expected to strongly complement S&P Capital IQ’s offerings in banking and insurance and expand the analytics and capability of Platts.
lead_paragraph: McGraw Hill Financial, the owner of Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services and S&P Capital IQ, said on Monday that it had agreed to buy the financial data and information provider SNL Financial for $2.2 billion in cash.

headline.main: McGraw Hill Financial Buys SNL Financial for $2.2 Billion
headline.print_headline: McGraw Hill Agrees to Buy SNL Financial
